Values.AzureWebJobsStorage: DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=<- your account name ->;AccountKey=<- your account key ->;BlobEndpoint=https://<- your account name ->.blob.core.windows.net/;TableEndpoint=https://<- your account name ->.table.core.windows.net/;QueueEndpoint=https://<- your account name ->.queue.core.windows.net/;FileEndpoint=https://<- your account name ->.file.core.windows.net/

Values.AzureIoTHubServiceConnectionString: <- your IoT Hub's service and registry readable role's connection string ->
